content.question: Task 3: Conversation You will participate in a simulated conversation. Each time it is your turn to speak, you will have 20 seconds to record. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible. There will be four times when it is your turn to speak. Introduction: You will have a conversation with Reiko Matsumoto, your friend Kenji’s mother, about you giving her English lessons. Response 1

frqParts.text: Task 3: Conversation You will participate in a simulated conversation. Each time it is your turn to speak, you will have 20 seconds to record. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible. There will be four times when it is your turn to speak. Introduction: You will have a conversation with Reiko Matsumoto, your friend Kenji’s mother, about you giving her English lessons. Response 1

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
